**General Information** ğŸ¯

__Information about general__ ğŸ“Œ

The computational capabilities are highly advanced, featuring server-grade workstations with Nvidia RTX 4090 GPUs, high-performance workstations with MSI 4080 SUPER GPUs, i7-14700K processors, and 64GB of high-speed RAM, capable of handling intensive AI, machine learning, 3D rendering, and data analysis tasks. Capstone projects are final-year projects for senior students in the HDT (Humanities and Digital Technologies) program. Fourth-year HDT students working on their capstone projects are eligible to use the Arts Tech Lab facilities.

Let me know if you need more specific details about general!
